articles.title: Work Brisk to Recover from Flood Damage
articles.content:
Work Brisk to Recover from Flood Damage 
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- A work is progressing apace in the areas of the DPRK hit by consecutive days of heavy rain and downpour.
					 The city of Pyongyang and local areas are tapping all reserves and possibilities to ensure the supply of necessary materials and mobilizing all manpower and means on the basis of the assessment of the damage done to those areas.
					
					 Urgent consultative meetings took place in the flood-stricken areas to take measures to bring the living of the inhabitants there to normal. Rapid progress is being made in the work to reconstruct the dwelling houses and public buildings destroyed by heavy rain and downpour and put roads and bridges into their original shape.
					
					 The working people in South Hamgyong Province reinforced all the destroyed irrigation waterways in at least 110 places in a short span of time while those in North Phyongan Province are reporting successes everyday in the project to improve the flood-hit rivers and streams.
					
					  South Hwanghae Province drained off water from the waterlogged thousands of hectares of paddy and dry fields, reducing the damage done to crops. It is now busy clearing ditches near fields and improving river embankments.
					
					 The work to recover from flood damage is also making brisk headway in railway transport, post and tele-communication and other fields in flood-stricken Jagang Province. Rail roads have been put into order and tele-communication lines in the destroyed or inundated major construction sites restored immediately.

articles.title: Achievements Made in Medical Science and Technology
articles.content:
Achievements Made in Medical Science and Technology
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- Workers in the field of public health of the DPRK have researched into and manufactured efficacious medicines and medical appliances by use of raw materials found in abundance in the country and developed programs helpful to preventive and curative medical care.
					At least 2,500 data on new technological achievements are on display in the 13th national exhibition of scientific and technological achievements in the field of public health under way at the Three-Revolution Exhibition since Monday.
					
					 Medical appliances including the device for fixing suture for heart surgery, a variety of diagnosis and remedies are drawing attention of visitors for their great efficacy in treating patients.
					
					 New innovative remedies were studied and introduced at healthcare units in Pyongyang and are now paying off profusely.
					
					 Those in South and North Hamgyong provinces have made research achievements helpful to putting diagnosis on a scientific basis and raising the efficacy of medical care. The Dental Preventive Hospital of North Phyongan Province succeeded in settling by itself the problem of the materials for dental treatment for which it depended on import and is now widely using them for preventive and curative service. 
					
					 The staff of the Central Hygienic and Anti-Epidemic Center, in particular, have established a state monitoring system for epidemic diseases and developed new program for further expanding and reinforcing the preventive network nationwide.

articles.title: Month of Solidarity with Korean People Closes in Cuba
articles.content:
Month of Solidarity with Korean People Closes in Cuba
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- The month of international solidarity with the Korean people was closed with due ceremony in Havana on July 30.
					 Attending the ceremony were personages of the Cuban Institute of Friendship with the Peoples, the Cuban Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification and the "Chollima" Shipyard of Cuba and other Cubans. The DPRK ambassador to Cuba and staff members of his embassy were present there on invitation.  
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 Juan Jose Leon Vega, first vice-chairman of the Cuban Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification, noted that the Cuban people and the world know well about the fact that the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet forces provoked the Korean War on June 25, 1950, adding that the U.S. imperialists suffered a shameful defeat for the first time in history and signed the Armistice Agreement on July 27, 1953. 
					
					Recalling that President Kim Il Sung exerted his tireless efforts for the reunification of the country till the last moments of his life, he stressed that his cause of national reunification is now being creditably carried forward by General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The Cuban people have always voiced full support to the Korean people in their struggle for achieving the independent and peaceful reunification of the country and will do so in the future, too, he declared.
					
					 Lashing out at the Lee Myung Bak group of south Korea for bringing the situation on the Korean Peninsula to an extreme pitch of tension through madcap exercises for a nuclear war, pursuant to the U.S. imperialists' policy, far from implementing the north-south joint declaration, he declared that no matter how frantic they may become in their war exercises for aggression, they are no more than reckless plays with fire. 
					
					 He stressed that the excellent friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries provided by Fidel Castro and Kim Il Sung would last forever on the road of the struggle against imperialism.
					
					 The Cuban people will as ever make all efforts for the unbreakable friendship and solidarity between Cuba and the DPRK and extend full support and solidarity to the Korean people in their struggle for the independent and peaceful reunification of the country, he concluded.

articles.title: War Exercises and Police Suppression under Fire in S. Korea
articles.content:
War Exercises and Police Suppression under Fire in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- The Youth and Students Solidarity for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration in south Korea released a statement on August 6 condemning the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors for its madcap large-scale war exercises in the West Sea of Korea.
					 The statement said that the firing drill being conducted by the military warmongers against the north in the waters where armed forces of the south and the north stand in acute confrontation with the largest forces and war hardware in history involved could not but be interpreted as a declaration of war against the north. 
					
					 All Koreans will never pardon the war-like Lee regime keen to ignite a war at any cost through reckless war moves, said the statement.
					
					  The organization released a statement on August 4 in denunciation of the puppet police suppression. 
					
					 The statement recalled that when the illegal investigation into the chairman of the Youth Society for Reunification conducted by "the Security Investigation Group" under the Kyonggi District Police Office was disclosed, it went reckless, showing summons to appear at police station like a thief crying "Stop the thief!," and searched his house in the end. 
					
					 The statement demanded the present "government" stop at once all repressive actions under the pretext of security.

articles.title: Songun Politics Praised by Mexican Party Leader
articles.content:
Songun Politics Praised by Mexican Party Leader
Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- Cuautemoc Amezcua Dromundo, chairman of the Central Committee of the Socialist Popular Party of Mexico, made public a statement on August 1 on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 Kim Jong Il started his Songun revolutionary leadership by providing field guidance to the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su 105 Guards Tank Division of the Korean People's Army on August 25, 1960, he noted and went on:
					
					 The Songun politics is a political mode of regarding military affairs as the most important of the state affairs and defending the country, the revolution and socialism and energetically pushing forward the overall socialist construction in reliance upon the revolutionary traits and militancy of the KPA.
					
					  Thanks to the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Il the politico-ideological and military positions of the Korean revolution have grown as firm as an iron-wall, the single-minded unity of all members of the society has been further cemented, international solidarity with the DPRK has been daily boosted and the DPRK's relations with other countries have rapidly gained in scope and strength. 
					
					 The recent anti-DPRK confrontation rackets of the hostile forces including the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean group of traitors proved to be totally bankrupt in face of the might of Songun and the dignity of Songun Korea was fully demonstrated.
					
					 The revolutionary parties and the progressives of the world aspiring after socialism are waging a dynamic struggle, seeing the victory of socialism in the Songun politics pursued by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Only victory and glory will always be in store for the Workers' Party of Korea, the army and people of the DPRK advancing under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: War Moves of US-South Korea Censured in Czech
articles.content:
War Moves of US-South Korea Censured in Czech
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- The Czech, Moravian, Silesian Trade Unions' Association Tuesday made public a statement in denunciation of the evermore undisguised anti-DPRK war moves of the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces.
					 The statement accused the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces of contemplating staging ceaseless exercises of various forms for a war of aggression in the wake of joint naval maneuvers conducted in the East Sea of Korea with huge arms forces involved despite the repeated warnings of the DPRK and the protest of the world peace-loving people. 
					
					 The statement termed their war exercises an undisguised provocation to the DPRK.
					
					 The association demands the U.S. and the south Korean puppet authorities halt at once the war moves for aggression against the DPRK, the statement declared, expressing support with the Korean people in their struggle to protect peace in the Korean Peninsula and in the rest of the world.

articles.title: Anniversary of Start of Songun Revolutionary Observed in Mexico
articles.content:
Anniversary of Start of Songun Leadership Observed in Mexico
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- The Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism issued bulletin No. 43 on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 Carrying his photo, the bulletin said in an article that the Songun politics pursued by Kim Jong Il, chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, was a fundamental factor that made it possible for the DPRK, not a big country, to protect its sovereignty and dignity and win a victory, standing firm in confrontation with the U.S. styling itself the world's "only superpower." 
					
					 The bulletin referred to the fact that Kim Jong Il has led the People's Army to creditably perform its mission as a defender of the socialist country, firmly established the traits of attaching importance to military affairs throughout the society and carried out the work for putting all people under arms and fortifying the whole country at a higher level.
					
					 Kim Jong Il has further reinforced the single-minded unity of the society in the DPRK, brought about a stirring reality in which it is making a leap forward toward a thriving nation, ushered in a turning phase in Korea's reunification and remarkably raised the international position of the country with his Songun leadership, it stressed.
